trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported> event is included in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support compatibility with Silverlight.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>evento está incluído em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para oferecer suporte à compatibilidade com o Silverlight.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to ensure compatibility with Silverlight, use the touch events, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>, on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Se você não tiver que garantir a compatibilidade com o Silverlight, use os eventos de toque, como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>, na <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the TouchFrameEventArgs to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> values that are relevant to the touch event.
trans-unit.target: Use o TouchFrameEventArgs para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>valores que são relevantes para o evento de toque.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, you can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> of the touch and determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> was a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> action.
trans-unit.target: Do <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, você pode obter o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A>de toque e determine se o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>foi um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>ação.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>para obter <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, you can determine the device <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> and get information about the element that is touched.
trans-unit.target: Do <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, você pode determinar o dispositivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>e obter informações sobre o elemento que é tocada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current touch point of the primary touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o ponto de toque atual do dispositivo primário toque em relação ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: In a set of active touch devices, the first device to be <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated> is the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: Em um conjunto ativo dispositivos sensíveis ao toque, o primeiro dispositivo para ser <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>é o dispositivo primário toque.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>

trans-unit.source: For example, if two fingers are touching the screen, the first finger that is down is represented by the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se dois dedos tocam a tela, o dedo indicador que está inativo é representado pelo dispositivo primário toque.

trans-unit.source: If the first finger is lifted while the second finger is still down, the primary touch device becomes `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o dedo indicador é eliminado enquanto o segundo dedo ainda está inoperante, o dispositivo de contato primário se torna `null`.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que define o espaço de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar coordenadas absolutas de WPF, especifique `relativeTo` como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> relative to the specified element; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is not active.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual do primário <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> em relação ao elemento especificado; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o primário <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> não está ativa.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection that contains the current touch point for each active touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção que contém o ponto de toque atual para cada dispositivo de toque ativo em relação ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que define o espaço de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar coordenadas absolutas de WPF, especifique `relativeTo` como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"></xref> for each active <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"> </xref> para cada ativo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não está implementado.

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for Silverlight compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Este método é fornecido para compatibilidade do Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: Because of device implementation differences, it is not implemented in WPF.
trans-unit.target: Devido às diferenças de implementação do dispositivo, ele não é implementado no WPF.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o carimbo de hora para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: O carimbo de hora para esse evento.
